channel.title: Error runing my client
channel.description:
Ok. When I try to rung I get this.
[code]Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4486) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4266) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]
Help me please?
